title:
Why don\'t the obituaries include the cause of death? Is it a privacy issue or the policy of the paper? I understand the suicide aspect. 



I was just thinking that some light  could be focused on a particular illness if readers could see the frequency in which it strikes someone down.



I am always curious when a young person is listed.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7688
